name: Beedrill
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: Its best attack involves flying around at high speed, striking with poison needles, then flying off.

poke_power.name: Flutter Wings
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a {G} Pokémon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can’t be used if Beedrill is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Needle Shock
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned. Ignore this effect if any of your Pokémon used Needle Shock during your last turn.
